message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $120 is a bit high. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $100.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $110.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $105.
I understand you're still not satisfied with the price. I'm willing to make a small concession. I can sell the product to you for $115.
I'm still not convinced. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $108.
I'm starting to get concerned that we won't reach an agreement. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $118.
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $112.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $125. This is my final offer.
I'm sorry, but I've reached my limit. I'm not willing to pay more than $110. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to look elsewhere.
